com.brightcove.player.view

Class BrightcovePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcovePlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, Component

    @Emits(events={"activityCreated","activityDestroyed","activityPaused","activityRestarted","activityResumed","activitySaveInstanceState","activityStarted","activityStopped"})
@ListensFor(events={"activityDestroyed","activitySaveInstanceState"})
public class BrightcovePlayer
extends android.app.Activity
implements Component
    An Activity with basic life cycle and full screen support. The onCreate() should be extended to wire up the activity's layout to the brightcoveVideoView instance variable. For example: brightcoveVideoView = (BaseVideoView) findViewById(R.id.brightcove_video_view);

      • getBaseVideoView

      • showClosedCaptioningDialog

        public void showClosedCaptioningDialog()
        Show the closed captioning dialog for making changes to styling options. This method should only be called on Android versions prior to KitKat, as these settings are built into KitKat and above.

      • hideClosedCaptioningDialog

        public void hideClosedCaptioningDialog()
        Hide the closed captioning dialog for making changes to styling options. This method should only be called on Android versions prior to KitKat, as these settings are built into KitKat and above.

      • fullScreen

        public void fullScreen()
        Expands the BrightcoveVideoView layout parameters to match the parent and hides the ActionBar.

      • normalScreen

        public void normalScreen()
        Returns the BrightcoveVideoView to it's original layout parameters and restores the ActionBar.
